#
# Source files: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE: edit CMakeListsLocal.txt instead.
#
#

SET (LOCAL_LIBRARY_BASENAME vtkRealignResample)

INCLUDE (${VTKREALIGNRESAMPLE_SOURCE_DIR}/cxx/CMakeListsLocal.txt)

# --------------------------------------------------------------------------
# You probably do not need to modify anything below this line

#
# Create the vtkRealignResample C++ library
#
# (Doesn't work here because of a CMake bug)
# ADD_LIBRARY (vtkRealignResample ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

#
# Create the vtkRealignResample Tcl library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKREALIGNRESAMPLE_WRAP_TCL)

  VTK_WRAP_TCL (vtkRealignResampleTCL RealignResampleTCL_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkRealignResampleTCL ${RealignResampleTCL_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleTCL 
                         vtkRealignResample
                         vtkIOTCL 
                         vtkGraphicsTCL 
                         vtkImagingTCL 
                         vtkFilteringTCL 
                         vtkCommonTCL
                         ${TCL_LIBRARY})
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleTCL vtkHybridTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleTCL vtkParallelTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleTCL vtkPatentedTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleTCL vtkRenderingTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKREALIGNRESAMPLE_WRAP_TCL)

#
# Create the vtkRealignResample Python library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKREALIGNRESAMPLE_WRAP_PYTHON)

  VTK_WRAP_PYTHON (vtkRealignResamplePython RealignResamplePython_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

  IF (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkRealignResamplePython MODULE ${RealignResamplePython_SRCS})
  ELSE (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkRealignResamplePython SHARED ${RealignResamplePython_SRCS})
  ENDIF (APPLE)

  IF (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResamplePython 
                           vtkRealignResample
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           debug ${PYTHON_DEBUG_LIBRARY} 
                           optimized ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ELSE (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResamplePython 
                           vtkRealignResamplePython 
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ENDIF (WIN32)

  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResamplePython vtkHybridPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResamplePython vtkParallelPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResamplePython vtkPatentedPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResamplePython vtkRenderingPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKREALIGNRESAMPLE_WRAP_PYTHON)

#
# Create the vtkRealignResample Java library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKREALIGNRESAMPLE_WRAP_JAVA)

  VTK_WRAP_JAVA (vtkRealignResampleJava RealignResampleJava_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkRealignResampleJava SHARED ${RealignResampleJava_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleJava 
                         vtkRealignResample
                         vtkIOJava
                         vtkGraphicsJava
                         vtkImagingJava 
                         vtkFilteringJava
                         vtkCommonJava)
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleJava vtkHybridJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleJava vtkParallelJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleJava vtkPatentedJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResampleJava vtkRenderingJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKREALIGNRESAMPLE_WRAP_JAVA)

#
# Link to VTK and local
#

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (
  vtkRealignResample
  vtkIO
  vtkGraphics
  vtkImaging 
  vtkFiltering
  vtkCommon
)

IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResample vtkHybrid)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResample vtkParallel)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResample vtkPatented)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkRealignResample vtkRendering)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
